onboarding.welcome: 👋 Hello! You are in the AMANITA ecosystem
onboarding.invite_from_link: We found an invite code in your link
onboarding.no_invite_explanation: Ask for an invite from those who are already part of our community
onboarding.success: 🎉 Congratulations! You have successfully joined the AMANITA ecosystem.
onboarding.blockchain_error: ❌ Error connecting to the blockchain. Please try again later or contact support.
onboarding.code_not_found: ❌ No such invite code was found. Please check if you have entered it correctly.
onboarding.code_already_used: ❌ This invite code has already been used. Each code can only be used once.
onboarding.error: ❌ There was an error while verifying the invite code. Please try again later.
onboarding.user_already_activated: ❌ You have already activated the invite code before.
onboarding.invalid_format: ❌ Incorrect code format. The Invite code must consist of 12 characters (letters and numbers).
